1. City Council

City Council
============

1. [City Charter / Code of Ordinances](https://library.municode.com/tx/san_angelo/codes/code_of_ordinances)
2. [City Council District Map](https://cosa1.maps.arcgis.com/apps/webappviewer/index.html?id=1d4fca5a9f4c419da8d5374880a86b30)

The City Council is a seven-member policy board for the City of San Angelo.

The Council meets twice a month at the McNease Convention Center, 500 Rio Concho Drive. Meetings are open to the public and are usually held on the first and third Tuesday of every month at 8:30 am

City Council Strategic Priorities
---------------------------------

Anyone who requires an auxiliary aid or service for effective communication, or a modification of policies or procedures to participate in a program, service or activity of the City of San Angelo, should
[email Angela Bloss](mailto:Angela.Bloss@cosatx.us)
,
call 325-650-1814
or
fill out this online form
as soon as possible but no later than 48 hours before the scheduled event
